Joe Donnelly in Northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear front-runner, and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said. "I think he'd clear the field." Mike Pence is from Columbus and was an attorney before running unsuccessfully for Congress against Democrat Phil Sharp in 1988 and 1990. He
